sentence.Network_en: The aphid is now laying waste to the wheat and barley fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 蚜虫正在毁掉一片片的小麦和大麦田地。

sentence.Network_en: Since aphid population may become resistant to organophosphorus compounds, avoid excessive spraying.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为蚜虫类对有机磷化物能产生抗性, 所以要避免过多的喷洒.

sentence.Network_en: Aphid count on plants in fields do not correlate with virus spread in the same fields.
sentence.Network_cn: 田间植株蚜数与同块田内病毒的扩散程度间无相关性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: back-formation from aphides, plural of aphis

entry.def: Aphids are very small insects which live on plants and suck their juices.

means.word_mean: 1. any of various small plant-sucking insects
